translations: v.给……薪金（salary 的过去式和过去分词）
adj.领薪水的；付给薪水的；（按月）领工资的

phrs.translation: 薪金政策的执行；薪酬管理

sentences.sentence: The recent rise in prices tells heavily on low-salaried employees.
sentences.translation: 最近的物价上涨对低收入雇员的影响最大。

sentences.sentence: They had salaried jobs that paid well and gave them enough time off to enjoy their relative wealth.
sentences.translation: 他们的工作薪酬高而且有足够的假期享受他们相对富裕的生活。

sentences.sentence: Salaried employees receive the same pay from week to week regardless of the number of hours they work.
sentences.translation: 周薪制职员每周领取相同的工资，无论他们一周工作了多少小时。
